ai-atk-s0102a5:130_0: Having worshipped the Fortunate One’s Dhamma teaching, he fell into the presence of the Fortunate One, having risen from his seat, bowed down with his head, and respectfully circled the Buddha, keeping him on his right. Then he entered the city, circumambulated the One with his own hands, and respectfully circled the Lord of the Truth: “After going into the sky, he circumambulated the mountain with his own hands, and with his own hands, and with his own hands, he departed in front of the Buddha,
